description:
The first thing I thought when I met RJ was "beefcake". He's got a really nice gym body and a face that just oozes sex appeal. He's gotten into martial arts recently so he's got a few bruises here are there, but that's OK.
When we were doing this film, I just couldn't get over how sexy his eyes are. I didn't want to stare, but it was real hard.
Here's a boy who likes lube. He really slathers himself up and pumps it hard. He seemed to have fun doing the video and at the end he really gets into his orgasm.
title: RJ
